title: The Walking Dead Finale Originally Had a Different Ending
description:
Did you hear? The Walking Dead, one of our generation’s defining television shows, ended this past weekend. Besides wrapping up as many core stories as it could, the big reveal was something our own Rob Bricken described as “all that anyone still watching the show wanted to see.” However, the ending you saw was not…

title: Philippine Navy Says China Forcibly Seized Suspected Rocket Debris
description:
According to Philippines military officials, China’s coast guard forcibly blocked a Philippine naval boat on Sunday as it was towing suspected rocket debris from the South China Sea to the Philippine-occupied Thitu island, the Associated Press reported.

title: Florida Manatees Are Starving En Masse. Conservation Groups Want Them Back on Endangered List
description:
Environmental groups launched a petition on Monday to once again list manatees as endangered, as hundreds of the beloved sea cows die from starvation.

title: The Amazing Art and Toys We Loved at Designer Con 2022
description:
Imagine a place where monsters live with robots. Where the pinkest, prettiest thing you’ve ever seen is right next to the darkest and most gruesome. A place where art, pop culture, and collectibles collide like asteroids into a planet. That place is the annual Designer Con, and it’s the coolest place you’ve ever been.

title: Webb Telescope Reveals Noxious Atmosphere of a Planet 700 Light-Years Away
description:
Astrophysicists on Earth are no strangers to WASP-39b, an exoplanet orbiting a star about 700 light-years from Earth, though they’ve never actually seen it directly. Now, the Webb Space Telescope has offered fresh insight into this distant world: Its observations have revealed the recipe list for the planet’s toxic…

title: Meta AI Bot Contributed to Fake Research and Nonsense Before Being Pulled Offline
description:
Meta paused its Artificial Intelligence (AI) bot last week, only two days after it went live to the public. The bot, called Galactica, was trained “on 106 billion tokens of open-access scientific text and data. This includes papers, textbooks, scientific websites, encyclopedias, reference material, knowledge bases,…

title: UK Regulators Want Apple to Open its App Store Doors to Cloud Gaming
description:
Apple’s walled garden is a nice place to be if you want a no-fuss experience with technology. But the bushy greens and red roses don’t necessarily indicate you’re getting the most out of the device in your hand. title: Strange World Is a Wonderfully Weird and Fantastic Family Adventure
description:
From the team behind Raya and the Last Dragon comes Strange World: Walt Disney Animation Studios’ latest feature, an eccentrically excellent pulp sci-fi adventure. It’s a wonderfully weird gem that I hope springboards into serialized tales about the Clade family that anchors the film.

title: WikiLeaks' Website Is Falling Apart
description:
For a period of time in the 2000s and 2010s, WikiLeaks was a name synonymous with whistleblowing. The non-profit organization’s website was the place on the internet for information that someone, somewhere didn’t want you to see. But now, much of that information appears to have vanished. WikiLeaks’ website is full of…

title: Ticketmaster Will Now Have to Explain Itself to Lawmakers Following Taylor Swift Ticket Disaster
description:
The fallout continues from last week’s Ticketmaster fiasco as Taylor Swift fans scrambled to buy tickets to the popstar’s upcoming The Eras Tour. The surge promptly crashed Ticketmaster’s website. In the aftermath, an echoing battlecry from fans, musicians, and politicians emerged against Ticketmaster for their…

title: Hideaki Anno's Ultraman Fan Film Is Now Officially Streaming
description:
Shin Ultraman is the realization of a dream generations in the making for Neon Genesis Evangelion’s Hideaki Anno—working with Shinji Higuchi to craft his own spin on the legendary franchise that inspired legions of his own work. And now, it’s getting even easier to see just how long Anno has been influenced by Ultraman…

title: NASA Downplays Launch Pad Damage Caused by SLS Rocket
description:
A scorched platform, fried cameras, broken pipes, and a busted elevator are among the casualties of last week’s launch of NASA’s SLS rocket. Mobile Launcher 1 and Launch Complex 39B at Kennedy Space Center will require repairs, but NASA says they’ll be ready for the next Artemis mission.

title: China 'Resolves' Gaming Addiction So It May No Longer Need Pesky Industry Regulations
description:
“Solving” gaming addiction sounds as easy as easy as “solving” alcoholism, but China’s state-affiliated body overseeing video games seems about ready to call recent efforts at curbing gaming use among children a “success.”

description:

An executive vice president at Sony Pictures Entertainment, Stevens oversees worldwide consumer products for Sony Pictures film and television, as well as…

title: Trump's Truth Social Gifted Nearly One More Year to Finalize Shady SPAC Merger After Shareholder Vote
description:
The shell company struggling to take Donald Trump’s Trump Media and Technology Group public just bought itself some desperately needed time. Thanks to a new shareholder vote, Digital World Acquisition Corp (DWAC) will now have until September 8, 2023 to complete its merger with the Truth Social parent company

title: Elon Musk's Wealth Drops by $8.6 Billion in One Day
description:
Tesla, SpaceX, and Twitter CEO Elon Musk saw his wealth plummet by $100 billion dollars this year, bringing his net worth to somewhere between $170 billion and $182 billion, according to estimates from Bloomberg and Forbes. That’s down from an estimated $340 billion in November 2021. The drop comes as Tesla shares…

title: Martin Scorsese's Goncharov (1973) Is the Greatest Mafia Movie Never Made
description:

description:

title: New List of the Most Dangerous Pathogens Will Include ‘Disease X,’ the Likely Next Pandemic
description:
The World Health Organization is creating an updated list of the globe’s most dangerous microbes. The public health agency will recruit over 300 scientists to work on the list. They will consider known germs across dozens of virus and bacteria families. One automatic inclusion will be “Disease X,” the moniker given to…

title: Avatar: The Way of Water Needs to Make $2 Billion to Break Even
description:

description:

description:

title: Hundreds of Arizona Households Set to Be Without Water by End of Year
description:
More than 500 households in the rural Arizona desert are set to be without running water starting January, 1 2023, as first reported by NBC News. description:

description:

description:

title: An iCloud Feature Is Enabling a $65 Million Scam, New Research Says
description:
